title: One day trip to Mtskheta
about: The ancient capital of Georgia is located close to Tbilisi and makes a beautiful day or even half-day trip.You can start your trip even at the afternoon and enjoy visiting UNESCO world heritage sites: elegant Svetitskhoveli Cathedral and 6th century Jvari Monastery overlooking splendid view ofMtskheta with the confluence of two rivers Aragvi and Mtkvari.
